Uses of Interface
java.rmi.Remote

  • Packages that use Remote 
    Package Description
    java.rmi.registry
    Provides APIs related to the RMI registry.
    javax.microedition.xlet.ixc
    Provides facilities for inter-Xlet communication (IXC).
    org.dvb.io.ixc
    Provides support for inter-application communication.

    • Uses of Remote in java.rmi.registry

      Subinterfaces of Remote in java.rmi.registry 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Registry
      Registry is a remote interface to a simple remote object registry that provides methods for storing and retrieving remote object references bound with arbitrary string names.
      Methods in java.rmi.registry that return Remote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Remote Registry.lookup(String name)
      Returns the remote reference bound to the specified name in this registry.
      Methods in java.rmi.registry with parameters of type Remote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Registry.bind(String name, Remote obj)
      Binds a remote reference to the specified name in this registry.
      void Registry.rebind(String name, Remote obj)
      Replaces the binding for the specified name in this registry with the supplied remote reference.

    • Uses of Remote in javax.microedition.xlet.ixc

      Classes in javax.microedition.xlet.ixc that implement Remote 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IxcRegistry
      IxcRegistry is the bootstrap mechanism for obtaining references to remote objects residing in other Xlets executing on the same machine, but in separate classloaders.
      Methods in javax.microedition.xlet.ixc that return Remote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Remote IxcRegistry.lookup(String name)
      Returns a reference, a stub, for the remote object associated with the specified name.
      Methods in javax.microedition.xlet.ixc with parameters of type Remote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void IxcRegistry.bind(String name, Remote obj)
      Binds the specified name to a remote object.
      abstract void IxcRegistry.rebind(String name, Remote obj)
      Rebinds the specified name to a new remote object.

    • Uses of Remote in org.dvb.io.ixc

      Methods in org.dvb.io.ixc that return Remote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Remote IxcRegistry.lookup(XletContext xc, String path)
      Returns a remote object previously exported by an Xlet that has not been destroyed.
      Methods in org.dvb.io.ixc with parameters of type Remote 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void IxcRegistry.bind(XletContext xc, String name, Remote obj)
      Exports an object under a given name in the namespace of an Xlet.
      static void IxcRegistry.rebind(XletContext xc, String name, Remote obj)
      Rebind the name to a new object in the context of an Xlet; replaces any existing binding.
